title: How to Uninstall WhatsApp on Android

steps.title: Tap the Play Store icon on your Android .
steps.content: Tap the Play Store icon on your Android . It's the sideways triangle icon in your app list. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You'll see it at the top-right corner.
steps.content: You'll see it at the top-right corner. This opens a menu.

steps.title: You'll see this on the profile menu.
steps.content: You'll see this on the profile menu.

steps.title: This is on the resulting menu.
steps.content: This is on the resulting menu. Here you can do things like update and remove apps from your Android.

steps.title: Tap the name of the app you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the name of the app you want to delete. As long as the app didn't come preinstalled on your Android, it will be easy to delete.

steps.title: This removes the app from your Android.
steps.content: This removes the app from your Android. You can reinstall the app at any time.
